Web Build Compelling Solutions The web provides a unique opportunity for individuals and entrepreneurs to build solutions for real world problems. Mobility Unlock The Power Business houses are using the power of Smartphones to connect & engage with people with Robust Mobility Solutions. Cloud Scale Globally With a growing number of people using the internet, integrated cloud solutions ensure systems run stable. VR Building a Second World Immersive Multimedia experience has brought forward a revolution in offering unique solutions in many industries. SaaS On Demand Software Software as a Service for entrepreneurs who want to rely on a core technology partner for releasing their business online. Choose the Leaders Our Global Delivery Model has spread smiles all over the World Our Value Stack Our Technology Stack allow us to spun development, deploy apps rapidly and help slash costs. Emphasis on ROI We solve real world business problems with a focus on delivering measurable RoI on every project. Co-Located Teams Our Co-located teams significantly outperform distributed teams in terms of productivity. User-Centered Design Whether it’s consumer adoption or employee adoption, We belive in the interaction design philosophy. TRUSTED IT VENDOR SINCE 2004 With Prime focus on Skill & Innovation We Work for Startups, Enterprises and Prime Vendors. Armia is a global IT solutions company with over 12 years of experience and more than 100 employees. We provide full-cycle services in the areas of software development, web-based enterprise solutions, web application and portal development. We combine our solid business domain experience, technical expertise, profound knowledge of latest industry trends and quality-driven delivery model to offer progressive, end-to-end web solutions. What clients said Mike Serrano Armia was a game changer for me. I knew what I wanted to do and how I wanted to do it. The challenge for me was to cost effectively build the application. I looked at a number of different options Amy Recchia I am really happy with the way the site turned out and am excited to launch this endeavor. I already have a list of future customizations and will let you know when I am ready to start them, but for now I am focusing on getting it off the ground... Thank you and your team for all of your hard work. Chris Zelenka Thanks again for your support and I think you guys have some cool products and solutions and will keep them in my arsenal of recommendations if I encounter anyone looking for an off the shelf solution. balkon pod klyuch Garrett Richardson I really appreciate you from the initial point of contact all the way through the thorough detail you and your team at Armia have given me on my project. I couldn't be a happier client! Mike Morris The group that I have been working on headed by Sajin at "Iscripts" has been extremely easy to work with through our process of moving our old software into a new format. They are very patient and allow me to explain what we were doing with the existing software then, they make the various modifications and enhancements necessary, and then we review and test for application errors. HOW WE WORK Simple Steps . Quick Results Analysis & The first step is to get a complete understanding about your application and business needs. One of our senior software architects will discuss your requirements, preferences, and target audience for the application. UI Design & We build a Scope of Work document that captures the scope of the project along with the specifications, requirements, constraints, and assumptions. We review with the client to ensure that our solution is on target. We Test & We fix all the rough edges. Our software engineers improve the functionality while the graphic design team enhances the User Interface & User Experince. We also do a multi-point quality check for stability & perfection. Trending on the blog Follow our blog to stay updated How Do You Develop a Successful Mobile Application? read more HOW TO CHOOSE THE LANGUAGE FOR YOUR WEB APP? We have done a salary comparison inclusive of average annual incomes of software developers in the US(Chicago(IL), San Francisco(CA), New York City, Boston(MA)), Norway, Australia, Finland, the Netherlands, Sweden, Denmark, Germany, New Zealand, France, Israel, Switzerland, and the UK.
